name: The Dusty Attic
description: You wake up in a small, dusty attic. Cobwebs cling to the rafters. A single door leads downstairs.

name: Ground Floor Hallway
description: A long, empty hallway with faded wallpaper. To the east is a kitchen and a staircase leads back up.

name: The Kitchen
description: A surprisingly clean kitchen with a large wooden table. A window looks out onto a dark garden. The hallway is to the west.
